name: New Jewels Unlimited Game
description:
New Jewels Unlimited Game!!!
Matching and puzzle gaming meet with delicious jewel 3 match gameplay for unlimited amusement. Over 200 levels of pure puzzle gems, diamonds match and matching jewel games gameplay are awaiting you! Start the journey of unlimited strategy, shiny gems & diamonds and puzzling levels that require your smart moves for matching and thinking.
features:
- Hundreds of blitz levels!
- Win the shinning jewels star
- Different worlds, different adventure!
- Brand new power-ups and boosters!
- Green diamonds help you to beat hard levels
- Fun and easy to learn, but a challenge to fully jewels saga master
